did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Scott Chesney's Gay Games 94 and Stonewall 25 March memorabilia, 1994.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Programs, fliers, handouts, event-specific magazines, newspapers, broadsides, and other memorabilia from the Gay Games 94 in New York City, and the Stonewall 25 March.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Gay Games participant, member of New York Ice, the hockey team.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Programs, fliers, handouts, event-specific magazines, newspapers, broasides, and other memorabilia from the Gay Games 94 in New York City, and the Stonewall 25 March.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Scott Chesney's Gay Games 94 and Stonewall 25 March memorabilia, #7583. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
